ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On that Day they will be partners in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, they will become partners in punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On that Day, they will all share the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day they will all share the torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So this day they all are partners in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then verily, that Day, they will (all) share in the torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they shall on that day be sharers in the chastisement one with another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So all of them on that day are sharers in the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then lo! this day they (both) are sharers in the doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day they will all share the punishment:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So verily on that Day they all in the torment will be sharers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So, that day they will share the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly, that Day, they will (all) share in the Penalty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then verily, that Day, they will (all) share in the torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore, on that Day they will all share Our punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On that Day, they will share in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:33] God, exalted be He, says: So they on that day, the Day of Resurrection, will share in the chastisement, for they shared in the error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then lo! this day) which is the Day of Judgement (they (both) are sharers in the doom) the worshipper and those worshipped.
